name: The Westin Dallas Fort Worth Airport

reviews.text: I hotwired this hotel as we were driving through Texas. I paid $79 for a 4 star, so I can't complain too loudly! The room was clean but had a stale odor. My 6 year old said it smelled like animals. The furnishings seemed to be mismatched.
reviews.title: Don't go hungry

reviews.text: OH, the bathroom! Double shower heads, luxury towels, sturdy fixtures....double shower heads!
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: We were starving when we arrived, so we thought we'd get something to eat around the hotel. Wrong! This hotel is on the back side of DFW airport and there is nothing around but hotels, a gas station, and a Denny's. We went ahead and checked in and decided we'd take a chance on the hotel restaurant, the BlueFire Grill. It looked nice from the lobby and it was not crowded. After waiting to be greeted at the door for 5-7 minutes, I noticed the bartender and a waitress sitting at the adjoining bar. Both looked up on seperate occasions, but neither came over or called for help. We turned and left....as did others. Now we know why it was not crowded! Their loss! But, we were still hungry. Not wanting to face my screaming 6 year olds, we walked across the street to Denny's. I swore off Denny's long ago, but I have to admit, there's nothing like eggs and hashbrowns at 10:00pm.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable, upscale hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Westin at DFW is a nice Hotel for overnight stays.
reviews.title: great for overnight stays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff are super friendly and a must do is eat at the Blue Fire Grill in the Hotel.
reviews.title: Liked the heavenly beds and dual head shower!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tip...pick up point from DFW is a little awkward to find.
reviews.title: Excellent & Convenient

reviews.text: Nice Hotel and would strongly recommend for transiting the DFW area
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I concur with the good reviews for this hotel. We hotwired and hoped for the Hyatt at the DFW airport, but got this one. It was a nice pleasant surprise.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel and Staff, a bit noisy

likes.liked: — Friendly staff, coffee shop and lounge
likes.disliked: — Noisy guests, small bathroom in std. room

aka: The Westin Dallas Fort Worth Airport Hotel
description: The Westin Dallas Fort Worth is adjacent to DFW Airport and offers free airport shuttle service to all guests. Additionally, this hotel has event space perfect for weddings, meetings, and banquets.
